website_summaries.verdict: Versatile motorcycle tire that works for many kinds of bikes, including sport, touring, and cruiser.
pros: Tread pattern allows the tire to disperse water from the road in wet conditions
Has a strong sidewall to simplify use on rough roads
Installation is easier than you may think
cons: Some units may struggle to hold air after a few months of usage

customer_reviews.title: Tire test
customer_reviews.text: Trying out went for 3000 mile trip to desert and back to east ky,rode over wide variety of road conditions ,wet,gravel, hot,rough,pot holes ,rain,so far pretty good no problems,I've rode for 40 years so have had different tires so far these are performing fine .rode at various speeds high to low and are on 2003 Sportster if I get 8000 miles from them I will be happy,that's my average tire life for anything
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worried about cracking on tread
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with this tire, good traction, easily mounted, good balance and delivered fast too. After only about 400 miles I'm noticing "cracking" on the tire. Not sure yet what it will lead to as far as longevity but it's a little concerning. More updates ahead.
customer_reviews.author: Mike E.

customer_reviews.title: hugs turns very well
customer_reviews.text: good quality and very smooth. grips very well compared to the higher end brands but wears a bit faster. I would rather have a softer tire that grips than a harder tire that gets more miles. hugs turns very well. been using these on my honda rebel for years. this is my 4th set. these tires have a 100mph rating and for small motorcycles.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Udell

customer_reviews.title: Go Kenda!!
customer_reviews.text: People give me all kinds of negativity about Kenda, but I've used them before and haven't had any reason to give negative feed back on them. They wear no worse than the expensive brands and they handle as good as the best of them at a very reasonable price. Just can't see spending the big bucks when they have to be changed every couple years because of wear and or weather cracking. Can't be too safe when it comes to two wheels.
customer_reviews.author: D & R

customer_reviews.title: Best rear tire I've had on my cruiser yet,  ordered another one for next season already.
customer_reviews.text: Dude, this is the best tire I've had on my 04 Triumph America in 3 years I've owned it. I replace the tires every season in Michigan and usually get 3-4k miles out of them, this tire lasted 4k miles and still has much tread to spare. My Dunlops lasted around 2k miles before they were worn out to the point of needing replaced. I'm not doing burnouts or riding that hard either so idk what to say about dunlop. GREAT tire, would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Calvin

customer_reviews.title: First impressions very smooth and corners way better then the dunlops that were on there
customer_reviews.text: Put a set of these on my 82' Yamaha xj750 maxim. First impressions very smooth and corners way better then the dunlops that were on there. This is my second set of kenda motorcycle tires and I haven't had any issues yet. Didn't need to add any extra balance weights from what was on the rims.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. E

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Changed from Bridgestone to these and they work so far. Haven't had chance to ride in wet, or any other adverse conditions yet, but I'm happy so far. But I have put a few hundred miles on them since changing. Update. I've ridden in the rain now. They tend to lock up easier in the rain, but I'm gonna buy them again when I wear them out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2004 Ninja 250
customer_reviews.text: Picked up a 2004 ninja 250 still had the original tires on it. Needless to say they needed replacing. Decided to go with these tires and haven't looked back. I'm certain these are the best tires you could possibly slap on a ninja 250. Not only does the bike handle worlds better even in the hardest turns, but they seem to be holding up quite well. I commute 30+ miles each way to and from work, and have been for the last 6 months and the tires appear to be near new! I'm shocked as I am used to replacing tires every 6 months on my R6. Hoping to get 2 years out of these tires!
customer_reviews.author: Sticky

customer_reviews.title: Great tire!
customer_reviews.text: Great tire and great price! Arrived sooner than expected. Will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Trisha A

customer_reviews.title: rear tire for my sport bike
customer_reviews.text: Bought this rear tires for my sport bike mainly for the low price, fairly good ratings, and they don’t look half bad either. I can be a fairly aggressive rider and this tire worked just as well as the other two more pricey tires I had on the bike before. They lasted just as long as the factory IRC tires that the bike came with new at about 3000mi before wearing them down to the wear indicators. The tires on the bike before these were Michelins that lasted about 500 mi longer but for the price you can’t go wrong with this tire
customer_reviews.author: Mike Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good OEM replacement
customer_reviews.text: These tires are firm but still soft enough to grip the pavement with confidence. However, since these tires are harder you have to be very patient with the top coat wearing off after installing the tire. It a few hundred miles before I was confident in them staying planter over white lines when taking tighter right hand turns. This tire could easily last longer than the OEM tire that comes on your bike if this fits it while still performing as good fi not slightly better.
customer_reviews.author: William Morris

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Only 250 miles on it so far but they handle great. I have an 05 VTX1300, have had Michelin, Metzler, and Avon. Can’t speak to wear yet but handle as well maybe better than any of them for about a third of the price.
customer_reviews.author: WRalston

customer_reviews.title: Decent product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Decent tire..its no Michelin but it's a good buy for the money..it has decent grip , I'm not gonna complain to bad..Im no stranger to Kenda tires ..ive used them on and off for years..
customer_reviews.author: tooltimetim3

customer_reviews.title: Great Tire For The Money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Kenda instead of going with the OEM recommendation of Dunlop after reading reviews on Amazon and on the net. I've got about two thousand miles on the tire and it is in great shape. Never had a problem with it while cornering or making quick side movements to avoid obstacles. Plenty of grip and no bouncing, excessive noise, or air loss. I do not ride my Honda VT1100C in the rain so can't speak to how the Kenda handles the wet surfaces. However, I feel confident that the tire will handle just fine in the rain. So pleased with the Kenda I just put in an order for a front tire.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: It's sticky and lasts about 3k miles if you ride hard.
customer_reviews.text: Tire grips like a son of a gun! You're only gonna get about 3k miles out of it, but that's me maxing out 5th gear and cramming the bike into corners at speeds that weren't intended for a cruiser.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Sexy tire that doesn’t make me look fat
customer_reviews.text: This one holds air. My other one didn’t so already I have to be a big fan right? A pretty dang solid tire that improved the handling characteristics of my Vulcan 900. I’ve had several girls come up to me and ask if they could touch it......so there’s that.
customer_reviews.author: Bad bitch

customer_reviews.title: Great Overall Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value. First time using Kenda, got caught in the rain 4 days after installation and they handled great. I would buy again and recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip M

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, VERY FAST shipping, awesome quality!  Showed up 5 days early!
customer_reviews.text: Received 5 days early!! I think the Post Office thinks i'm weird getting tires from Amazon, however it saves m literally hundreds and the quality is awesome! I live in Hawaiian Island, in a small town, got here 5 days early, went on awesomely, etc. superb quality, absolutely no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: BigIslandBuddy

customer_reviews.title: Got 'em for my '91 Nighthawk.
customer_reviews.text: It's 2014 and I've had my Honda Nighthawk for almost a year now as a first bike. Just recently, I realized that this thing has been sitting on the stock tires and tubes for 23 years. Yikes. Figured it's time to update. The numbers are slightly different from stock, and I know the NH isn't technically a cruiser, but it fits like a dream and lowers the front end EVER SO slightly. It wasn't a huge change, but wanted a more aggressive bike anyway. Looks cool, too! -Ian P.S. Stock size tubes work great.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Great Traction in the Rain
customer_reviews.text: After riding for 40 years, I almost had my first crash. I was doing all the right things on a wet road. I was coming to a stop, and the bike started sliding. It was a used bike I bought about a month before. The tires looked good, but they were old. Old and hard rubber. I did some research and decided to give this tire a go. I am happy with my decision. Although any new tire would have been better than what I had, this one is great.
customer_reviews.author: nozama

customer_reviews.title: Very very well handling rain tire. Takes corners 💯
customer_reviews.text: My bike is doing 100+ mph on a daily basis. This tire when heated up takes the corners like a track tire idk how it handles so we'll but it's absolutely amazing for the price. And on the other side in the rain this tire is excellent I'm so impressed on how well this tire handles a 120hp motorcycle. Thank you whoever makes Kenda tires
customer_reviews.author: Edward DePlae II

customer_reviews.title: Great tire
customer_reviews.text: Received tire and mounted. Initial riding after mount seems to handle well. Ride seems smooth.and tire looks great. Will update after more riding
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good Tire
customer_reviews.text: This tire worked on my husband's motorcycle. It seems to be a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce V

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This tire was recommended on faq.ninja250.org as a touring tire. It has great traction and longevity. Much better then the stock tire that the bike came with. It feels very stable and has good wet and dry traction. The only con is that the tire is "heavier" so the bike is less "flickable" But honestly unless you are on a track it wont make much of a difference at all. I put this on my 07 ninja250 and love it and totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality tire for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality tire for the price, grabs pretty good when cornering. Now let's just see how many miles they can take and will review again.
customer_reviews.author: PHUCKobamaANDklinton

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I tried this tire. good tire great price.
customer_reviews.text: This tire looks good and rides great. As for durability I will have review later but regarding performance, great ride and lateral roll is smooth, no vibration at speeds up to 100mph and the grip in turns and under braking is better than the Metzler Marathon it replaced. I would buy it again, in fact I am ordering matching front tire.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Zurbrick

customer_reviews.title: It fits spoke wheels.  Great price.  Great tire
customer_reviews.text: It fits spoke wheels. Great price. Great tire. Great quality
customer_reviews.author: Slowlane

customer_reviews.title: A Gem!
customer_reviews.text: A gem! I have probably about 6,000 miles on this tire on my 1987 Yamaha Radian and I am expecting another 2 to 4 thousand miles are left on them. They have gripped the road very well for me, and I do ride rather aggressively (as aggressive as 55 horsepower can be anyways). They do just fine in the rain. I will be buying these for as long as I have my Radian and as long as they produce these. I LOVE that price! Credentials: Certified Motorcycle Technician, Your average rider.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems good so far
customer_reviews.text: I put them on a sport bike and they went on easy no problems so far and they look good on there.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great tire. Great quality. Worked perfectly on the motorcycle. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great tire at an unbeatable price
customer_reviews.text: Great tire at an unbeatable price. I expect to get between 8000 and 10,000 miles out of this tire. It is mounted as a rear tire on a 2004 Yamaha V-star 1100 Classic.
customer_reviews.author: Pastor Erstrom

customer_reviews.title: 2001 sportster custom
customer_reviews.text: Went on easilly with a little Windex. Got the 130/90 16. Bead seated with no effort. It lasted about 5000 miles before it was bald. I thought it would have lasted longer, but whatever.
customer_reviews.author: m speer

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT TIRE FOR THE PRICE.. !!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS THING. I GOT IF FOR MY NINJA 500R AND BOY I FEEL LIKE A BAD ASS WITH A NEW REAR TIRE. LOL. THIS TIRE PERFORMS VERY WELL AND IT IS VERY SMOOTH. I RECOMMEND !!!
customer_reviews.author: THE BIKER GUY

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 96 Honda Shadow VTC600. They work fine. Only about 150 miles on them so far.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great Tire five star
customer_reviews.text: I got this tire for my son's bike for his birthday. He had it installed a couple of weeks ago and I asked him a week later how the tire was. He said the back roads so much better and had great traction also on wet roads. He said he would highly recommend this tire to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... other than that it worked and has been working great. Lost track but I think I've got about ...
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit of a pain to get the bead to set but other than that it worked and has been working great. Lost track but I think I've got about 1-2k miles on it and it doesn't even look to have worn at all.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Great handling tire all around
customer_reviews.text: Great handling tire all around. I bought this for my v star 650 and could not be happier. I would definitely buy again, you can't beat Kenda when it comes to price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: shane k.

customer_reviews.title: Can loose grip on the road at times in just ordinary driving
customer_reviews.text: I used this tire for my Suzuki Intruder 1500 LC just to ride and cruise. It’s an overall great tire but in different weather conditions it seems to slip and not keep the best grip on the road at times especially if u get caught in the rain
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Kiste

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I've had a kenda before and got lots of miles from it, but, i drive relatively conservative. I got 10k from my last back tire.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Savings
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tire for my Yamaha Star. It was a great buy. Tires are good quality and much better price than buying at the dealer.
customer_reviews.author: Fabio Rocha

customer_reviews.title: good tire in the rain
customer_reviews.text: I've rode the tire for about a hundred miles in the rain is seems to grab the concrete extremely well has not tried to slide out at all I've only put a hundred miles does not seem like he's weird at all
customer_reviews.author: Elijah c.

customer_reviews.title: Buy a smother riding tire
customer_reviews.text: Road wrought, I wouldn’t by the same tire next time.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: 2006 DL650
customer_reviews.text: I installed these before a 2000+ mile trip and they have been great. Flawless in the rain, grippy in the curves, and they are crazy cheap. They look like they will hold up for quite a few miles. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: R. T. Pooner

customer_reviews.title: Super fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Got here two days after ordered! Looks like a good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Slays on the street
customer_reviews.text: Good on my drz400sm, doesn't do anything in dirt if you hit any mud, so beware of that!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Better than Dunlop by far
customer_reviews.text: I have been riding on this brand of tire for 5 years now on both my cruisers. They wear evenly and I get about 12,000 miles out of a tire. Good wet traction.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good fast service at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this tire for my custom electraglide, I've had it on the bike for a week with no issues. Price was fair, and my order was filled and shipped fast. Overall a good company to deal with and I will be a returning customer.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Simms

customer_reviews.title: Best rear tire on my whole motorcycle!
customer_reviews.text: I do not have an inordinate amount of experience with motorcycle tires in general but this tire is totally OK. WAY better than my previous tire, which was probably the stock tire that the bike came with and sat on flat at some point, I am sure. So far this tire is performing well. No anticipated issues.
customer_reviews.author: A. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Bang for you Buck
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and fit my 2012 CBR 250r without any problems. Tire is doing well after a few hundred miles.
customer_reviews.author: Patch

customer_reviews.title: Look Cool
customer_reviews.text: Not the longest tread life, but looks cool. Not great in the rain, not great off road, but hey, they kinda look cool. Finished the enduro look of my cruiser!
customer_reviews.author: Willaim

customer_reviews.title: These are best quality tires that are decently cheap
customer_reviews.text: These are best quality tires that are decently cheap. Not very soft but they will last many miles if you don't put a hole in it first. No problems in wet weather.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Short

customer_reviews.title: Delivered early, ordered Fri & was here Mon. ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivered early, ordered Fri & was here Mon. Haven't mounted yet, but am very confident with this tire. Planning a long run of trouble free cruising. If tire fails in anyway, I'll be sure to let it be known!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Trumper

customer_reviews.title: Kenda has great tires for the money
customer_reviews.text: Kenda has great tires for the money, put it on my sportster. Had a 150/80H16, this narrower one fits so much easier. I'm not an expert on tires, but it rides and handles fine for what I do. All I had were factory tires previously...... It's a tire, and it's cheap, met my qualifications, I'd put Kendas on all my bikes if I could
customer_reviews.author: Kent S.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: They have the same tire at dealerships for over 110$ There’s no difference at all, it works like a tire should so that’s all that matters. Stop and just buy it, it’s worth it👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. 6 month ownership. The only con is that almost no dealer would install a tire they did not for "liability" reasons. I think is more like moneybility reasons. Anyway, I ended up paying as much as the tire cost for installation. still, I like them
customer_reviews.author: R. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent production
customer_reviews.text: The tire looks like it has excellent tread. It was just put on the bike, going for a ride this afternoon
customer_reviews.author: Judi Beach

customer_reviews.title: ... about 300 miles on these so far and they're great. I've got them on a 300lb gz250 and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've got about 300 miles on these so far and they're great. I've got them on a 300lb gz250 and it stays planted pretty well. Haven't had it on a wet road yet so can't comment about that. I definitely recommend. I installed these myself and no wobbles or balancing issues either.
customer_reviews.author: Duke Family

customer_reviews.title: Great tire for a fair price
customer_reviews.text: A quality tire at a fantastic price...a smooth riding tire for my '09 Suzuki C50 Boulevard
customer_reviews.author: J. ONeal

customer_reviews.title: Street cruiser
customer_reviews.text: I like that it looks great and it rides nice on my motorcycle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good tire on a budget
customer_reviews.text: Good tire on a budget. I used it for a 2011 ninja 250 and am sure it fits other small displacement motorcycles as well. I did not get much use out of it due to getting a flat on the highway but it seemed to wear very well, much better than the stock IRC's that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Handling
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Handles predictability. Grip is good, doesn't get too warm considering the weight it's carrining..
customer_reviews.author: Ironbutt

customer_reviews.title: The price is good and the quality is excellent
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these to replace dunlops. I've put a couple hundred miles on them in one day and can already tell theses will be my go to tire from now on! The price is good and the quality is excellent! They corner well and no noise.
customer_reviews.author: ron showman

customer_reviews.title: Good Tire
customer_reviews.text: Good tire, I've put around 1,500 miles on it thus far and its looking great.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: ... I have bought this tire and I am very pleased with its performance on both dry and wet surfases
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd time I have bought this tire and I am very pleased with its performance on both dry and wet surfases. It makes a great difference in my commuting for the better. I feel safer and more secure with this tire.
customer_reviews.author: J. Maranville

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, inexpensive tire. Works well on my CB750 Nighthawk. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great Ride!!!
customer_reviews.text: I put these Tires on my Bike, and I am Very Happy with the ride now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worthy
customer_reviews.text: Great price, good handling, good wear (so far). Put this on before a 700 mile trip which covered plenty of curves and a bit of rain with no problems whatsoever. UPDATE: as of 8/28/2013, STILL cooking along with this tire, and no complaints ayetall....
customer_reviews.author: Dave B

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: SO FAR IM REALLY SATISFIED WITH THE TIRE IVE PUT ALOT OF TIRES ON MY BIKE IN THE PAST YEARS IM STILL HOPEING FOR THE LONG MILES IT WAS ADVERTISED AS A 6-PLY AND ITS ONLY A 4-PLY BUT STILL RIDING IVE PUT 3500 MILES ON IN THE LAST 2 AND A HALF WEEKS AND THE TREAD LOOKS LIKE IT HANDLES VERY GOOD THANKS
customer_reviews.author: RICKY

customer_reviews.title: Great tires. I get about 8-10k miles per set
customer_reviews.text: On my third set on my ninja ex250. Great tires. I get about 8-10k miles per set. I live in central IL with flat straight roads. Well worth he money.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good commuting and all around tire
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for the buck tire for commuting and general use. Good traction wet or dry. Medium compound rubber so they last longer than a more sport/performance oriented tire, though not as 'Sticky' as a softer tire.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: I like the quality & price
customer_reviews.text: I'm running Kenda tires on 2 of my 4 bikes, the other 2 are for sale. I like the quality & price. Great Value!
customer_reviews.author: James McAdams

customer_reviews.title: Great tire
customer_reviews.text: Great tire seems to be wearing well. Good traction not to rigid or too soft
customer_reviews.author: David conner

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a great buy so far.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a set of these for a Harley Sportster & so far I'm satisfied. See my other review for more details.
customer_reviews.author: 4strokes

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Can’t really talk about mileage or longevity since I just got it, but very happy with this tire
customer_reviews.author: Maui 1

customer_reviews.title: first pair
customer_reviews.text: its brand new i got the size i needed it came in on time yes i have 2001 yamaha xvs 650 and has been confirm it is being installed as i review. i also purchase the front street tire kenda name brand as a set. shop wise. its good to go its rated for 130miles my cruiser top 110 so make sure your tire meets your bike performance and size
customer_reviews.author: ManGoOn

customer_reviews.title: Honda Rebel 250
customer_reviews.text: I have an '86 Honda Rebel 250 and despite the fact that Amazon says that this tire will not fit, it worked perfectly. Tire offered great stability at highway speed and great traction. I will definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Trask

customer_reviews.title: Honda Rebel 250
customer_reviews.text: I have an '86 Honda Rebel 250 and despite the fact that Amazon says that this tire will not fit, it worked perfectly. Tire offered great stability at highway speed and great traction. I will definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Trask

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Sold my bike before I put it on but it was new and looked great.
customer_reviews.author: ZachAttak

customer_reviews.title: Great tires
customer_reviews.text: Lasts just as long as "premium" tires for a low price. Grips great, wet or dry! Can't complain! Been wrenching & riding bikes for 40 years.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: The tire tread it thick and the ride is now a little ruffer, but all in all great buy. The tire has Great Traction.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Teraoka

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great front tire for VTX1800c
customer_reviews.text: My Metzler 880 was getting a little scary on my bike, so I put this Kenda up front. Worked out great, and looks good. I've gotta wait a little for some rain and a few miles to see how it holds up, but so far its well worth the price vs a Metzler or Dunlop wide front tire.
customer_reviews.author: rsd86

customer_reviews.title: Look good
customer_reviews.text: tires look good have not had chance to ride bike yet
customer_reviews.author: Phil H

customer_reviews.title: Good tire
customer_reviews.text: The tire is amazing. It rides awesome and has lasted a good while. I like it so much I’m replacing my front one with the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal W

customer_reviews.title: Great thus far
customer_reviews.text: Too early to rate the longevity and mileage. But the tire looks good, aggressive tread and solid workmanship. We'll see!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: like install! )
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly as a replacement for the stock rear tire on my 2012 Cleveland Cyclewerks - Tha Heist. Much cheaper than buying from local shops (though, support them in other ways, like install!).
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: this product was the cheapest I found the tire looks great perfect fit it was just as I stated in the overview I will purchase the front tire and yours later when I have to replace them again
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: I want to give this tire 5 stars, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I want to give this tire 5 stars, but I can't quite. The reason is traction in the rain. As in you have none. Too many times I've felt the rear tire spin on wet surfaces under gentle acceleration from a stop. I've come to accept it, but my riding habits adjust on wet pavement significantly. I near the Appalachians in VA, so I ride mainly windy mountain roads. I've leaned the bike far enough over to scrape the lower fairings of my Ninja 500R without loosing grip. I wouldn't want to try that in colder weather or on even slightly wet roads. Pros: Grip fairly well Decent life Cheap!!!! Cons: Sketchy wet grip
customer_reviews.author: MotoHokie

customer_reviews.title: Great Tires!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had them long so I can't comment on mileage yet but the ride is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the tread pattern and the ride. Quality I expected from Kenda Tire!
customer_reviews.author: rich

customer_reviews.title: Good value. I like them so far.
customer_reviews.text: Put 1,000 miles on them and they seem fine. Handle well. Seems good in water. I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: About 700 miles on tire and seems to have superior traction in wet or dry conditions
customer_reviews.text: About 700 miles on tire and seems to have superior traction in wet or dry conditions. Showing no wear yet.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great tire for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is my third kenda cruz and I'm an aggressive rider and they seem to last as long as I need them to for the money, if I wanted them to last longer then I would invest in a more expensive tire
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice tire. Hopefully it lasts a long time. Super easy to mount.
customer_reviews.author: Erics9971

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price$
customer_reviews.text: Mounted and balanced well. Sticks to the road. Good product for the price$
customer_reviews.author: bjclover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it fit. it works. it rides well. price was decent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tire.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this tire for about 3 months now and it's fantastic. No issues whatsoever. My guess is the people who had issues had the tire mounted or balanced wrong. Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Rock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement!
customer_reviews.text: Great tire I have had good luck with it's durability and tread wear. On a heavy bike excellent wet and dry tracking smooth cornering
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Great tire
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical due to the low price, but this tire handles great. Just as good at the dunlops I normally run for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: CharlesR2

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this tire. Works better than the stock tyres on my C50.
customer_reviews.author: ramaz

customer_reviews.title: biggest tire that would fit my bike a 1985 gs450l
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend a 90-90 but the 100-90 went in with some shoehorning to get past the fender mounting bolts Since I do a lot of soft surfase riding I like the larger footprint tire (sometimes I take the bike through the woods) If you stay strictly on the asphalt a narrower and lighter) tire would be better
customer_reviews.author: Keith D. Broussard

product_meta.title: Kenda Cruiser K671 Motorcycle Street Tire - 170/80H-15
product_meta.description: Size:170/80H-15Available for low profile sport/street tire applications.
feature_bullets: DOT approved, H-rated for speeds belted up to 130mph.
6-ply rated, tubeless construction for sport, touring, and cruiser bikes.
Deep offset tread sips proved for excellent water dispersion and wet weather traction.
Stiff sidewall provides better performance and handling.
Wide contact patch for superior traction and increased mileage.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars469 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
